confirmed_facts: 12 CubeSats launched aboard Nuriho reached their target orbit.
9 of the 12 CubeSats successfully established communication.
The remaining 3 CubeSats are still attempting to establish communication.

timeline.event: Announcement that 9 CubeSats are communicating; 3 still attempting.
